name: Archer Boy (itch)
description:
Archer Boy is in trouble! Use your bow to shoot hostile enemies and try to survive each wave of new enemies. Aim to enemies' heads to deal extra damage! Gain money and upgrade your stats as the enemies grow stronger, or recruit friendly archers that will help you to shoot enemies!

The game features:

  • 30+ levels
  • 20+ unique enemies
  • Bosses
  • Stat upgrading
  • Autosave

Controls:

  • WASD - Move Archer Boy
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Mouse Left Button - Shoot
    • Hold to Charge, Release to shoot
  • F11 - Full Screen
